sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration', templateUrl: './registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration.component.scss'] }) export class RegistrationComponent { form = new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl('', Validators.required), lastname: new FormControl('', Validators.required), username: new FormControl('', Validators.required), email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern(/^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[^\w\d\s:])([^\s]){8,16}$/)]), ripetiPassword: new FormControl('', Validators.required), accetto: new FormControl('', Validators.requiredTrue), }) onSubmit(){ console.log(this.form.value); } }

Registrati

Il campo nome è obbligatorio
